omopColumns.name: NhsNumber
omopColumns.query:
select  
		distinct
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.AEAttendanceNumber,

			coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as EpisodeStartDate,
			coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as EpisodeStartTime,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EpisodeEndDate,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EpisodeEndTime,

			ae.AEArrivalMode as SourceofAdmissionCode,
			ae.AEAttendanceDisposal as DischargeDestinationCode

	from omop_staging.sus_AE ae
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: AEAttendanceNumber
dataSource.description: ATTENDANCE IDENTIFIER is a sequential number or time of day used to enable an attendance to be uniquely identified.

omopColumns.query:
select  
		distinct
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.AEAttendanceNumber,

			coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as EpisodeStartDate,
			coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as EpisodeStartTime,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EpisodeEndDate,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EpisodeEndTime,

			ae.AEArrivalMode as SourceofAdmissionCode,
			ae.AEAttendanceDisposal as DischargeDestinationCode

	from omop_staging.sus_AE ae
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: visit_start_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: VisitStartTime
dataSource.description: The earliest episode start time for the spell, or midnight if none are specified.

omopColumns.query:
select  
		distinct
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.AEAttendanceNumber,

			coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as EpisodeStartDate,
			coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as EpisodeStartTime,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EpisodeEndDate,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EpisodeEndTime,

			ae.AEArrivalMode as SourceofAdmissionCode,
			ae.AEAttendanceDisposal as DischargeDestinationCode

	from omop_staging.sus_AE ae
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: visit_end_date

dataSource.name: VisitEndDate
dataSource.description: The latest episode end date for the spell, or the latest activity date if none are specified.

omopColumns.query:
select  
		distinct
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.AEAttendanceNumber,

			coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as EpisodeStartDate,
			coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as EpisodeStartTime,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EpisodeEndDate,
			coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EpisodeEndTime,

			ae.AEArrivalMode as SourceofAdmissionCode,
			ae.AEAttendanceDisposal as DischargeDestinationCode

	from omop_staging.sus_AE ae
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: visit_end_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: VisitEndDate
dataSource.description: The latest episode end date for the spell, or the latest activity date if none are specified.

dataSource.name: VisitEndTime
dataSource.description: The latest episode end time for the spell, or midnight if none are specified.

omopColumns.name: visit_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `9203`. `Emergency Room Visit`

omopColumns.name: visit_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`
